title: The Starling Cycles Clutch Stem Ain’t Boring
content:
Want something special for your Starling Cycles frame that’s different from the CNC offerings on the market? Check out the new Starling Clutch stem (£145.83). These are made in Taiwan to Starling’s spec, and finished in-house in Bristol, UK. You want it in Anodic Bronze? Done. Powder Pink? Go on then. Legacy color from your 2021 frame? You got it. It’s even available in a less-spotted RAW IPA finish.

And if you ever fancy a color change, Starling can repaint the Clutch no worries. If you’re in for a frame refurb down the line, they’ll do the stem for free at the same time.

Specs:

  • Dimensions: 35mm length | 0° rise | 1-1/8” steerer | 31.8mm handlebar clamp | 40mm stack height
  • Material: Handmade, brazed and heat-treated steel.
  • Colors: Anodic Bronze, Landy Green, Powder Pink, Steel is Teal, Ltd Ed IPA and all legacy colours.
  • Legacy Colours: Choose ‘legacy’ in the colour selector, and we’ll contact you to confirm details.
  • What’s included: Stem, bolts (M8x20mm), and paint of your choice (spacers and top cap supplied separately).
  • Warranty: 2-year warranty, crash replacement/refurb and repaint available.

Check out more at Starling Cycles.
